title: The Okay Spy
description: The events of the game take place in the middle of the plains. You play as a spy sent into the enemy headquarters in order to retrieve as much information about the enemy forces as possible. The enemy has left critical data and files everywhere without realizing it. The mission is to go it get as much intel as possible and get out.

title: A Gentleman’s Game
description: A Gentleman’s game tells the story of a friendly suburban squirrel that is stuck in between many forces. The squirrel’s home is being threatened by the new expansion of the local golf course. Bulldozers are destroying the trees that the squirrel uses for survival to make way for long green fairways and poorly managed invasive species of grass. Help the squirrel navigate through the golf course, and collect ten golf balls to pay some other furry allies to help stop the expansion!
instructions: Use the arrow keys to move around, and explore your environment

title: Errand Boy
description: The game is about a young boy who has taken a job working for a man called Boss, the boy does some fetch quest for him. As you continue to do the errands for him you have a sinking feeling the people in the neighborhood don’t really trust your boss. Maybe some people know more about Boss that might shed some light into this?
instructions: Arrow keys are the main input for movement, as well as continuing dialogue but dialogue can continue with the enter key as well. If you wish to interact with an item or character just walk up to them.

title: Haunted Mansion
description: On Halloween, your friends dare you to stay in a haunted mansion. Not wanting to be a coward, you agree. Can you escape the haunted mansion?

title: Stranded
description: A lone pilot is stranded in a desolate canyon after a devastating plane crash. Through his wits alone, he must escape this natural prison. Whether he survives is up to you
instructions: The player can use WASD or arrow keys to move. In order to pick up objects or interact with sprites, they will need to walk up to them or over them. Hopefully, everything else is intuitive.

title: Cave Diver
description: An underwater cave has the tendency to disorient curious adventurers. You awaken in a small air pocket at the bottom of the cave system. You must swim up and out to escape.
instructions: Movement controls with the arrow keys.

title: Jabari
description: The game center on a young boy in Africa named Jabari, who after a falling out with his little brother, Umba, has to go on a rescue mission to find his brother in the great African Grasslands. All matter of creature can be found here. Lions, Elephants, Giraffes, Black Mambas, and even mosquitos each equally as deadly as the other, but no matter what, you must bring your little brother home, and tell him your sorry and you love him, before it’s too late.
instructions: As a whole, in my game you must do three things, one is memorization, it requires you to use your head and really think about where you’ve been. Second, follow all the rules. It’s the only way to experience this game probably. Third and finally, you actually have a few options in gameplay, so also play the way you would like to play.

title: New Normal
description: It is a summation of the last 8 months of my life under COVID and what it had done to me. Its a tad personal, but I wouldn't have made it if I wasn't comfortable sharing it.
instructions: The only advice I have is that like life, there is no going back so if you miss dialogue you will need to play the game again to see it.

title: Kitty In The City
description: Kitty In The City is a 2D maze game where you play as a lost cat trying to find its way back from the Pound. Players need to traverse through colorful city streets while they eat as many mice as possible and find the correct way home!
instructions: To play the game simply use your arrow keys on your keyboard to move the cat and traverse each room, and also walk up to characters you see to interact with them!

title: To Be Seen
description: The life of a ghost can be awfully lonely. When new owners of the house you haunt move in, naturally you want them to know of your presence. Sometimes, however, people cannot pick up on the clues you leave them, and you may take to more extreme methods to be seen.

title: Dusty
description: You: a stranded spacewalker with a spaceship low on fuel. The only way out: collecting space dust to fill ‘er back up again. Your objective is to traverse the deep space and its planets to find this fuel, all the while coming across and conversing with some amusing – and questionable – aliens.
instructions: The arrow keys are needed to collect and interact with objects and sprites. For those looking to speed-run the game, the majority of solo sprites double as markers for the entry and exit points, and each interaction’s end will specify which direction you can go in. Also, avoid returning to the cockpit before collecting the space dust otherwise your progress will be lost, and the space dust count will revert to zero. Finally, don’t be too hasty as there’s a small easter egg in the game for Star Wars fans!

title: Sol 5250
description: Take control of the Mars Opportunity Rover on the 5250th day of his mission to collect rock and picture samples of the red planet. However, what may seem to be just another day for the Rover may turn out to mean much more.
instructions: All darkened objects are interactable. Read the computer screen on the left side of the screen to get game objectives. Player must be on the wheel tracks to enter the other sides of the map (left, right, and down). The player must return each sample once collected individually to the data hub before the game can continue.

title: Guiding Spirits
description: Explore a small landscape and help a series of ghosts reach closure. In doing so, your own path forward is revealed and you grow beyond your spirit guide apprenticeship into something greater.

title: SURVIVE
description: While on a group tour of the Steppe Grasslands of Central Asia, you hit a large bump and were tossed from your vehicle, suddenly you stranded in the middle of nowhere. With no communication devices you must find your way back to civilization. With the wild animals of the Steppe Grasslands of Central Asia, predators will not make this easy.
instructions: When first starting the game there will be a map, you will need to find more maps like this throughout the rooms you move through. Some tips may be easier than others! Make sure to talk to EVERY human you come in contact to before reaching civilization to help guide you. Not every room has a map, some tips are different.

title: Labyrinth
description: You are trapped in a Labyrinth and must find a way to escape. Locate different keys to secure your escape.

title: Dreamer’s Respite
description: Who you are is the key to escaping a horrible fate. Find yourself to find a way out of a world that is more transparent than it seems. Will you escape?
instructions: Figuring out where to go is the whole game. The bits represent finding yourself and who you are since you have to not only think outside of the box but also literally do it. The chests in the second level are representative of relationships -one contains a wedding ring, another crumbles ect.- and the last signpost is an open eye representing you waking up. *READ ONLY IF STUCK* The fake walls are located directly next to the chests that disappear. In order of levels the bits are located on top of the tree, bottom right of the chest maze, inside the W of wake. They flash.

title: Fish Quest
description: The player takes control of a young child that is staying over at their Grandfather’s house for the weekend. Your grandfather promised that the two of you would go on a fishing trip together, but he is unfortunately busy when the time arrives. Deciding to go at it alone, you set out to explore and navigate through the watery labyrinths on your first fishing adventure!
instructions: Interaction is done through the movement keys and moving towards the object. One last instruction is to interact with every object one can see for both hints and new dialogue text after completing the puzzle in the corresponding area.

title: Lead aStray
description: Buddy the dog starts his day at a bus stop with his owner and very best friend. However, Buddy is separated from him when his owner absentmindedly gets on the bus without him. Now, it’s up to Buddy to get to the next bus stop and track down his best friend.
instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Collide with NPC sprites to talk to them. Move over objects to pick them up.

title: Adventure to the Capital
description: In this game you take must go on a three-day Journey to the Capital, to find some medicine for your sick mother. With little more than the clothes on your and some food for the journey you must cross the vast forest separating your little village from the Capital.
instructions: For this game interact with all the NPC’s as it will provide you with not only the context of the story but also show you where you have to go, and what needs to be done.

title: Momma Frog and Frog Jr
description: Adeline Frog and Frog Jr.’s home goes up in pollution leaving them to be homeless. Follow them on their journey to find a new home for them and meet new creatures and environments on the way.

title: Escape
description: You wake up in an enchanted forest and have no idea how to get out. You hear rumors of a potion that gives you the ability to leave the forest. It’s up to you to find everything you need to make the potion, and to craft and consume it.
instructions: The game is basically a fetch quest game. It is recommended that you interact with everything available to understand everything you need to do. The game uses WASD controls.

title: The Wilderness
description: You wake up in the middle of nowhere in the wilderness. There’s a car missing its parts. Can you find the necessary parts to escape?
instructions: The instructions are basic and self-explanatory. Roam around the map until the player can gather all of the items to escape the wilderness.

title: The Great Missing Keys Journey
description: The Great Missing Keys Journey offers players a strange tale of a magical talking frog who ‘assists’ the player into finding their missing keys. Along the journey however, the player realizes that this frog is fairly unreliable, and they develop the suspicion that somebody is out to get them.
instructions: Give the frog some attention by talking with him in each stage for simple directions and his input on the area.

title: A Day of College
description: Play as a community college student heading out to your first day of college. On your way to class, you talk to interesting, quirky people.

title: Lost
description: You enter a cave that no one has entered before to find treasure. Will you make it out with the treasure?

title: Beyond the End
description: The game is about a young person waking up from cryosleep in an underground facility. The player then goes around looking for clues, notes, and objects to help them find their way out of the facility, as well as what has happened in the past that led to where they are.

title: Mind Expansion
description: Mind expansion takes the user deep into the mind of the Traveler. Starting from the beginning you the Traveler are a remembrance of your past stuck within a dimension that was penetrated by a dark force. As the Traveler you seek to complete the puzzles that lay ahead in order to return to your body in the human world

title: Morning Routine
description: The player follows a character who must go through their morning routine in preparation for work. The player goes through different required tasks from room to room making them feel like they are readying themselves for the day.
instructions: The player will encounter given dialog telling them what must be done in a certain room before exiting it.

title: Rogue Process
description: You are a computer program, spawned to do tasks around the computer for an administrative entity. Explore an abstract landscape that blends hardware and software objects, and choose your own fate.
instructions: Use the arrow keys to move around the map and interact with items/sprites.

title: Life Is A Bit Feudal
description: You are a farmer girl during medieval times going into town to sell your harvest. When you get there, though, the town is burned down! Now you must help put the village back together.
instructions: You simply use the arrow keys to walk around, and run into to objects/people to interact with them.

title: Amnesia
description: Imagine waking up with no recollection of where, who, and what you are. Do you think everyone is trustable and are you sure you want to face the truth or is it that you have no choice but to face the truth? Find out in the mysteries behind your woken-up Amnesia.
instructions: If the player is stuck on what to do next to trigger dialogue with NPC’s to get hints on how to proceed.

title: The Glitch
description: Nobody likes glitches in their video games, glitches can be a hassle for players and game developers. There is much more to glitches than we realize! Glitches are living and conscious beings like us and are known as Glitch Spirits. Glitch Spirits are in existence to help close anomaly portals that open in various video game realms, which leak into The Glitch realm and that is what causes games to have bugs. Follow a young Glitch Spirit’s journey as they try to close some of these portals, while making interesting discoveries on the way
instructions: You only need to use the arrow keys to move your character and to go through dialogue. Approach characters to speak to them and approach items to learn more about them or to pick them up if you need them. Be sure to look out for easter eggs/references! There are two endings in the game, so make sure to look out for that as well.

title: Get Out
description: The player must pass a maze and then think about how they will escape. The game requires exploring the first map in order to get out safely.
instructions: The player must explore the whole map

title: You Wake Up in a Daze
description: When you find yourself with no way out, you have to figure out a way to escape, or die. Help a lost soul figure out her past, so she can find a way forward.
instructions: One instruction I would give to players is to look carefully at your surroundings. Some things are not like the others.

title: Space Trip
description: You are a crewmate on a transport vessel. An accident occurred in the room you manage and you need to fix it. Interact with your crewmates to find a way to fix your problem.
instructions: This was made to be a simple version of the trade quests one might find in an adventure game. That being said the amount of things you can interact with is limited, leading it to actually be very linier, especially if you find the pattern.

title: Island Life
description: Island Life is a short game where the player can talk to NPCs and explore the island. Learn a bit about the world through interactions with the NPCs
instructions: Use any button to start the game, and use the arrow keys to move around.

title: Heaven and Back
description: Heaven and Back is a comedic game for the phone or computer in which the player dies and arrives at Heaven’s gates. Unfortunately, a dispute has arisen between the forces of Heaven and Hell over the player’s soul preventing them from directly entering the gates of Heaven. Now that they have been given entrance into Heaven’s waiting area, they must find some means of entering the afterlife and discovering any or each of the three endings that lead to eternity.
instructions: Heaven and Back is simple and the player should have no trouble finding the different endings. Every door can be entered and every room has something interesting to interact with or a person to talk to that may have information that can help, or at least entertain, the player.

title: Who am I?
description: You are trying to figure out who you are. You don’t know much and can only have the clues around you to piece everything together. What happened to you and why can’t you remember?

title: Shore Cleanin'
description: The gameplay consists of controlling a young girl who visits a polluted beach and the main objective is to collect all the trash on the sand to restore the beach to its previous state. The interesting thing is that there are many side quests such as retrieving eggs for animals or collecting seashells. To enter a new area of the beach, the player must go to the area where the arrow is pointing.

title: Whiskers is Hungry
description: You were heading home to feed your cat Whiskers. However, on the way, your keys fell off and were scattered by a garden maze by your house. Now you have to quickly find them and get in your house and feed Whiskers.
instructions: Move around to collect the keys.

title: The Pit
description: You're a dog traversing down a hole, going through different rooms. The different rooms all have a theme that centers around the stages of grief

title: Get A Clue If You Dare
description: If a murder occurs in a manor of murder, will your scream still be heard? In a wager to keep your soul you, Scooby Doo- must risk it all to get past each room, find all the weapons and choose which was used to kill the manors owner. They say it is bad luck to speak ill of the dead but what happens when you must speak with the deadliest of those that are dead?

title: Forest of Thorns
description: You’ve stumbled upon the dark and spooky Mysterious Forest at the edge of the Castle of Thorns. No adventurers before you have ever entered the castle, for local tales warn of the mad King of the Forest and strange creatures within its confines. Will you journey inside and uncover the strange rooms of mystery? Be warned that your escape will not be so simple.

title: Stolen Pride
description: Stolen Pride is about a samurai on the hunt for his stolen sword. Throughout his journey he traverses through many different terrains and interacts with many others while on his way to complete his quest.

title: Hide n Seek!
description: The playable character counts down as their friends hide and the player then has to go through two rooms looking for all their friends. Along the way, there are a few cats that will give you any hints if you get stuck. T

title: Hotel Camarillo: Abandoned
description: Hotel Camarillo: Abandoned is a sequel to the highly acclaimed (thanks to my 40/40 score) Hotel Camarillo. Hotel Camarillo: Abandoned follows a Thousand Oaks young adult who ventures into the recently abandoned Camarillo State Hospital, as the game takes place in 2004. This teenager is interested to go there since he heard rumors that television psychic and ghost hunter, Peter James, investigated Camarillo State Hospital (CSH) in 2003. This teenager enters the hospital from Santa Paula Street at Unit 28, which is now demolished, but historically recreated in the game using maps from the California State University Channel Islands archives on CSH.

title: Home Wake
description: Explore your home and memories of your family. Try to make your way back to them through this maze of rooms.

title: Rockstar
description: You are an assistant/ roadie to a very popular Rockstar, backstage before one of his shows. The Rockstar is having a mental breakdown and refuses to perform because he is missing various things in his life, so you are tasked to resolve these issues.

title: Mini Island Quest
description: Mini Island Quest is a game about a man that was on a boating trip that made a turn for the worst when a storm caught him and dragged him to the shores of an isolated island. His only company being a talking bowling ball. Search for hope and survive with coconuts
instructions: The game instructions or the objectives are told by the animated sprite in the game. If the player is missing an item, the character will not move on to the next room until it is collected.

title: Escape From The Monsters
description: The game is about playing as a human trying to escape a haunted house. They encounter different monsters along the way.

title: The Town
description: Town is a pixel game that lets the player play as a survivor of a car crash. Stuck with nowhere to go, the player must traverse through abandoned town and look for a way out. Along the way of trying to escape the story of the town will slowly unfold, whether all questions will be answered is to be found out.

title: Alien Investigation
description: You are part of an alien investigation agency. Your job is to investigate reports of UFO sightings in a small town, collect alien artifacts, and report any alien activity. However, you also have the choice to not report aliens and instead help them.

title: Everywhere at the End of Time
description: In Everywhere at the End of time you play as an unnamed cosmonaut travelling through the universe, feeling homesick follow this cosmonaut through their journey and dreams.

title: Feudal Era Japan: During A Time of War
description: You are in the feudal era in Japan. There is a disastrous war happening and everyone in the district of Chiran is relying on YOU to find the secret weapons to unlock the Ultimate Weapon that will help you conquer this war!

title: Time
description: The player looks at a painting on the wall of their bedroom reminiscing about an earlier time. They then go to sleep and drift off into a mystical dream where they meet a giant clock named Father Time. The player journeys through various doors in time to discover what it is they need to move on

title: A Cat in the City
description: A cat in the city is an adventure puzzle game, is just a small experience but it can make you think about the cruelty to animals and how some don’t make it and others do make it. A cat in the city is not really hard but if you’re not paying attention you can missed some key details needed in order to win.
instructions: There is a house that is your owner’s, look for clues outside first before trying to enter houses , you only get 3 lives before you can’t continue. Choose carefully.

title: Prison Escape
description: Prison Escape is a peaceful 8-bit dungeon crawler where the player is a prisoner who needs to escape from prison. The player must wander the prison in search of items that would help them get past the obstacles in their way to freedom.

title: House Party
description: The player is tasked with cleaning up a party that is taking place in his parent’s home before they arrive. There’s also a talking cat, but most importantly, make sure mom and dad don’t find out!

title: Hidden Treasures
description: The game features many interesting geographic biomes, alongside animated animals to help create an appropriate environment that helps encapsulate the player in this new world. The game is centered towards beginners and novices who are looking to ripen their basic video game puzzling skills.

title: Road to School
description: You play as a boy who sleeps past his alarm and is woken up by his Mom. He must quickly get ready for school by completing tasks such as showering, eating and putting on his shoes. He must then navigate through his neighborhood and reach the bus before it leaves.

title: The Missing Kids
description: A report comes in about a group of kids had gone missing while exploring a run-down school ground according to their parents. As a detective, you while be on these school, grounds to search for these kids with other officers while there is a demolition in progress of the school.

title: Portals, Cheese
description: Come play Portals, Cheese in a quest to find your lost cheese! You’ll need to figure out the maze and be careful not to step on portals that can take you away from your goal. From room to room, the only quest is to find that cheese!

title: Escape From The Dead
description: Escape from the Dead is a 2D computer game in which the player must find a way to escape from the building that has been exposed to a deadly virus. The player must navigate through the building to find all the keys needed to escape from the dead.

title: The Arctic Blue
description: The Arctic Blue is a game designed to portray the dramatic changes to the Arctic landscape and ecosystem that will result from the acceleration of climate change. Each level will show the chronological impact of a warming Arctic and the animals most at risk from these changes. Potential animal responses to these sudden environmental changes are also presented throughout the game with some being extremely drastic.

title: Left Behind
description: “It’s been one year since millions of people around the globe completely vanished in an instant. Some believe the cause to be a nuclear weapon, or perhaps aliens, or quite possibly the rapture, signifying the second coming of Jesus Christ. A man named Roy has taken to believe the latter, as he has joined a refugee camp dedicated to bringing about the Great Commission to those LEFT BEHIND. Things aren’t easy, as the prophesied AntiChrist has risen to power, destroying every man and woman who stands in his way in fulfilling his vision of a New World Order.”

title: Past
description: This game is about a son who lives with his dad. The father wanted him to bring medicine which caused him to relive his past and his choice to leave his family.

title: Road Trip
description: Road Trip, it’s a simple game about a group of friends that are going on their first trip together. They’re destination is to get to Frankie’s Campsite; along the way they meet some people that recommend some spots they should check out before reaching the campsite.

title: Stranded in Space
description: The game puts the player in a broken down spaceship and tasks them with repairing it. You must go around the ship searching through crates and cabinets to find parts to repair the ship. Computers around the ship will help guide you and once you have everything completed you can report to the captain of the ship to notify them of your achievement

title: A Day in the Life
description: This is a game where you the player must collect certain items throughout your house. You will start on the 2nd floor and make your way around to different characters trying to figure out what items you need to leave for the 1 st floor. Then you will collect the items down there and talk to the characters for guidance so you can leave for school on time.
instructions: Explore around the map and collect all the items to get to school on time. Pay attention to the exit messages when you are going between rooms.

title: Find the Crown
description: This game challenges the player by making them solve puzzles in order to find the crown. There are many secrets, and challenges along the way.
instructions: To beat the game, you must collect items to create a path to the crown.

title: Raccoon Simulation
description: In this game you will experience life as a raccoon. Explore your surroundings and collect toys and trashcans. Interact with objects and make it to the final trash can.
instructions: Use the directional controls on your keyboard to move.

title: You Lost Kid?
description: The game takes place in a large fish tank where the protagonist is a unique fish trying to find a way out of the tank to return home to the ocean. During their journey they interact with other ocean creaturesin the tank that given them hints and different ideas on how to escape. Some ocean critters also share stories on how some fish have tried escaping and ended up getting flushed down the toilet.

title: Outer Planet
description: The world is set on a planet in the outer rim of our galaxy. Where our player is set as the space traveler who has fallen from orbit on the planet which they were observing. Falling from the orbiting space station, you have found yourself stranded on a foreign planet. You must explore and collect resources to fuel your ship to get back to the space station. Local inhabitants will provide clues to the way through their planet and back to your ship. The planet is rich with resources that will help you return to the safety of the space station.

title: The Great Walk
description: You are a guy trying to get to work and you get stopped by a construction site and it is the only way to get to work, so you have to go through the construction through a series of mazes that are in the site.

title: Nightmare
description: You are stuck in an environment and the only way to escape is by exiting through a door. Problem is the door needs a key and you don’t have it. Go find the key and solve the puzzle to escape
instructions: Use the arrow keys for all controls including walking and talking to npcs. Find the key and escape!

title: A Dog's Journey
description: A Dogs Journey is a game of a lost dog who got lost in the streets and is trying to find its family. The dog encounters multiple people who scold him instead of helping him find his way. On the way to finding his family the dog encounters several treats like bones, water, maps and radios that help him find its family. I invite you to help doggy find its family.

title: Marsh Roamer
description: A small swamp game based around a frog and collecting items, to eventually meet up with their friend. Wholesome pixel art exploration game with some hidden secrets.
instructions: Basic instructions are simple WASD, or arrow keys to move, collect items and make it to the end of the rooms.

title: The Deep Blue
description: Come explore the deep blue ocean and its vastness as a small lost fish known as Jimmy. As Jimmy navigates his way back to his school of fish a treacherous passage lays ahead

title: Incorporeal
description: Unfortunate events from your past life have made ghost. How did this happen? How did you die? Collect your essences in order to find the afterlife and discover what happened!

title: Recover Ur ID
description: A game about a character named Nicky who needs to escape the escape room. Nicky first encounters a cat who gives her instructions on how to escape and what items need to be collected before leaving. Nicky later discovers that she is not in an escape room but was kidnapped and needs to escape quickly, only gathering her essential belongings. In each room of the house, Nicky hears her kidnapper getting closer by the minute.

title: Home
description: Home is about a cat going on a journey to find their beloved Master. The cat must traverse the ancient Egyptian desert and talk to the locals in order to find out where their Master has gone.

title: WarTom
description: You are stranded in a wartorn country deciding whether you want to leave the country or stay and survive you try to find resources that will help with either

title: Dungeon Destroyer!
description: Dapper fellow with horns and a top hat moves to the city to become a Dungeon Destroyer (TradeMark pending). He has a *non-cliche backstory* to motivate him through his dangerous job. Along the way he meets strangers that guid him, some of them curse him for stealing keys.

title: The Adventures of Skull Boy
description: The plot of the game is that you play this character who has made a deal with the devil for your soul. In order to get your soul back from the devil himself you have to travel to the underworld. In the underworld you are no longer alive and and just pure bones. You have to make your way through the underworld and jump across platforms and either avoid the minions of the level or just jump on them knocking them down.

title: The Jungle Of Woes
description: An explorable adventure game in which the player takes control of the character and navigates their way through the jungle environment. Along the way, the player will meet several characters and obstacles, with some repeating in later levels. The player must explore all three temples that are in the town of Woe, gathering the treasure that has been left behind. Once this task has been completed, the player has reached the end of the game

title: A Dogs Tale Vol III
description: A simple side-scrolling game in which the player starts as a dog exploring a mystical forest. You run into a cast of various friendly forest creatures and try to figure out a way to make it out of the forest.

title: Seal
description: “Seal” is a game where the player controls a seal (or an ambiguous sea animal) to find and eat fish for nourishment and survival. However, there are obstacles such as trash and sharks that can threaten the seal’s life, so they must navigate around them for their food

title: Dog Walk
description: This game is a simple spongebob themed game. Where a dog can walk around the park and the goal is to pick up krabby patties. A few obstacles to play with in this game, you shall figure out when you play.

title: Hello There
description: The main character goes through levels and talks to various characters while collecting items. These items will be helpful in the future. The game is based on Star Wars.

title: Corn Field
description: You go to a corn field maze and you get lost in the maze. Find you way out.

title: The Lost Diamond
description: The game “The Lost Diamond” is about a diamond that is far lost and hidden in a big garden. Many people know about the diamond and have tried looking for it but have gotten lost in the garden and haven’t been able to make it out.

title: The Okay Agent
description: This is a spy game where the player can pick what their in-game character does. The story takes place in the middle of an all-out war where your country has just been invaded. It's your objective to infiltrate the enemy headquarters and steal intel about the enemy movements and troop information. Each decision can change the outcome of the story.

title: Underwater Cave Dive
description: In the text-based game Underwater Cave Dive, an unexpected accident leaves you trapped underground. You need to find a way to the surface through the dark underwater cavernous expanse. You probably will not beat this game on your first try, and that is part of what makes this game so fun.
instructions: The only instructions you will need to play this game is to use a mouse to click on the actions that you would like to take. You should also be aware that there is timer for the amount of air left in your tank. It decrements after every turn while you are underwater and if it runs out, you lose the game.

title: The Unknown
description: The Unknown is a story about a soldier with a family legacy of military experience. It is supposed to highlight the cognitive challenges that come with a tradition of fighting. This tradition also comes with an expectation to continue the tradition. Any deviation from the unwritten rules of the family tradition comes with conflict and opposition. The Unknown also reveals the psychological challenges of being a soldier; including the ethical and moral dilemmas of leading oneself and other people into dangerous situations. The intended player of The Unknown is someone who is unfamiliar with the legacy of military families. This game can also be played by people who are experienced in military traditions, because it is a relatable experience; regardless of where in the military family culture an individual lies.

title: Dino Feed
description: The game is about you guiding an organism though the harsh world where the goal is to “eat or be eaten”. You shall be making decisions that would help influence how the creature’s future generation would develop in order to survive this harsh world. But as we all know these creatures will eventually be consumed by Darkness.

title: CatTail
description: CatTail is a journey like never before. To survive you must embrace your feline ways, without giving up what it means to be human. You’ve heard of isekai, now get ready for isecat, in CatTale.

title: Island of the Damned
description: In the game Island of the Damned you will be put a lone on an island with no memory of how you got there. You will be taken on a pure liner narrative experience with the options of investigating a few things to help you discover the mystery on your arrival.

title: The Gates of The Arctic
description: A Twine adventure through space where you play as the ship. Survive a space disaster, learn what irony is, and more!

title: AI Interaction
description: A text-based game where you speak with an artificially intelligent machine that is conscious. This game is meant for someone who has an interest in the cyberpunk genre where machines take over the world, and for anyone who is into the field over tech as a whole.

title: Simulation Zed
description: Congratulations! You have been selected to take part in an apocalyptic scenario experiment. This simulation will guide you through a personalized experience that will test your survivability and decision-making in the event of a Z-class outbreak. Please try to make informed and tactical decisions, especially when facing the living dead. And should you fail, don’t worry! It’s only the end of the world.

title: The Scary Room
description: You awaken without memory of how you arrived here. The room is small and damp. Suddenly you see a dead body.

title: Upstream
description: Upstream is a choice-based dialogue game with a simple premise, experience the life of a salmon. In my game you start as a baby, and it’s up to you to guide the salmon from baby’s to adulthood and eventually making the great migration to continue the cycle. She will be faced with predators, rapids, and the harsh environments but the ultimate goal is to survive and complete your purpose.
instructions: In this game, its key that you remember certain decisions you made. The important decision will pop up as remember.

title: Under the Cover of Chaos
description: You are an assassin contracted to kill the Warden of the Ludendorff Penitentiary. To evade security and to maintai a low profile, you infiltrate the prison as a convict. After a few weeks of casing and formulating a plan, you find out that your plan is rednered pointless when some other convicts start a prison wide riot.

title: Lightning
description: A text based game that tells a story of innocence and adventure in the face of chaos. It is an interactive story that details a broken relationship between a son and father. What starts as a simple camping trip, quickly turns into a fight for survival.

title: The Facility
description: You awaken on an operating table, remembering only that you volunteered to test a new experimental cure for the seasonal flu. You did not volunteer for what you thought and find horrors behind every door you discover. Will you find the way out and reach it alive?

title: Empanaders
description: We’ve all experienced the insufferable traffic in Los Angeles at some point in our lives, and collectively we can all agree that’s something we never want to go through again.With Empanaders, you now get to relive the stress and fatigue of driving on the LA freeways and roads in the comfort of your own home! You are tasked with making a downtown food delivery for your mom – a journey that starts in the valley – and along the way you will encounter obstacles that will or will not impact your final tip for the night. Choose wisely!
instructions: To play, you follow a colored link to what you think will be the best route. Your goal is to get to downtown by choosing the “best” interactions along the way, while losing as little money as possible. Sometimes your monetary losses will be inevitable and confusing – just like how everything in LA is!

title: Surf’s Up
description: Have you ever wanted to experience the thrill of catching the perfect wave and surfing it like a pro in front of all your friends! Come catch a wave on this Twine-based choose your own adventure, and carve your way into history!
instructions: Reference key for non-surfers: a. Winter Swell = Big waves that come only during the winter season b. On-Shore Winds = Wind that blows from the ocean onto the shoreline thus flattening and ruining any waves c. Kook = beginner surfers who have no idea what they are doing, and typically just put others in harm’s way because of it. (or someone with a lack of awareness/self-awareness) d. Wavestorm = A popular soft-top longboard that can be bought at Costco e. 2 Feet Overhead = Waves that are 7-8 feet tall (US) f. Low Pushing Tide = Low tide that is rising, allowing for bigger waves that barrel at beach breaks g. Firing = Really really good waves h. Jamie O’Brien = A professional surfer known for riding massive waves on cheap soft-top longboards i. Burning Down the Wave = Ride really fast down the wave j. Washing Machined = To get tumbled around under the water by the wave, like a washing machine does to clothes

title: New Perspectives on Draconic Life
description: You are a well respected knight and beastslayer that is known across the land for doing service within the community. When your Lady lends you out to a neighboring Lord to slay a dragon living in a bordering mountain range, you are forced to travel out of your town. However, this dragon seems less interested in battle than the ones you’ve encountered previously.

title: Ambush
description: Ambush takes place in the protagonist’s home during an abduction. The protagonist is woken abruptly by his brother during the middle of the night. Unsure of what's to come, the protagonist must choose the right passage inorder to survive his first encounter with the visitors from another world.

title: Dungeon Delvers
description: You are the leader of a small company of mercenaries, and you have been hired to retrieve the treasure of an ancient, unexplored ruin. You know that these usually have many traps and monsters inside. Will you get the treasure?

title: Murder Mansion
description: You get a mysterious letter from a friend inviting you to a dinner party. At the party you don’t recognize a single person. As the night progresses people start to disappear, will you find a way out alive?

title: Arachne's Haunted House
description: It’s Halloween, the best holiday of the year! You and your friends decide to check out a new haunted house. Nothing terrible can happen because of some cheesy haunted house… right? Only one way to find out.

title: Alien Escape
description: Alien Escape sets the player on a desolate unknown planet to which they must escape using whatever they can scavenge to repair their ship. While avoiding environmental hazards and carnivorous beasts, the player has to make careful decisions to ensure their survival.

title: Hero
description: Hero follows a superhero named Hero from his bed to the streets. He is challenged with some of the world’s most toughest decisions to be made. Choose the wrong one and be exiled forever but choose the correct one and be hailed a hero.

title: Baker’s Quest
description: You follow the story of Rusty, a young lad who recently moved to his uncle’s village to pursue an apprenticeship in bakery and live a peaceful life. However, things go awry on his first day on the job. A short adventure filled with freshly baked puns!

title: The Method of Loci
description: A mind palace is an imagined, spatial environment used to facilitate the recall of information. Miraculously, you stumble upon someone’s mind palace and are offered a tour. However, in a phantasmic space that can be shaped as the owner desires: anything can happen.

title: OCD
description: My goal with this game is to convey some of the feelings of exhaustion and embarrassment someone with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder might experience each day. I also attempted to touch on the feeling of trying to change your thinking pattern only to end up back in the obsessive loop. The game is not intended to be fun, and I ask that you read each page through all the way for the proper experience. If you get bored or restless, don’t quit, that is intended.

title: The Dread Necromancer
description: This game is an adventure game that take place in the Fantasy world of Cryptum, where you and your party of heroes take on the dreaded necromancer terror of an entire continent. You will have several choices to make as this game goes on which could spell doom for all of humanity.

title: Look for the Birch
description: Lily wakes up in the middle of the forest with no memory of the night before. Wearing last night’s garments and nothing more, Lily tries to find her way home. Little does she know the forest is alive and has other things in mind.

title: An Adventurer’s Life For Me
description: You wake up one day and realize that you haven’t done anything with your life. You decide to follow your childhood dream of becoming an adventurer. What experiences lie beyond the Adventurer’s Guild?

title: Secrets of Solitude
description: You wake up in an unknown environment surrounded by three doors. Which path will you choose to uncover the answers you need? Choose wisely
instructions: The only instructions I have for the player is how to read the text. Quotations means someone is talking and the italics mean that the player is thinking(inner monologue) instead of saying something out loud.

title: Your Compliance Is Required
description: Your Compliance Is Required is a short, hypertext narrative passage game programmed with Twine. It details the story of the player receiving demands from an unknown caller, and the player making choices on whether they want to comply with increasingly more brazen demands.
instructions: To play, the player simply makes their own choices by selecting the blue hypertext links. Be warned however, as once a selection is made their choice cannot be made undone.

title: Shame on the Night
description: In Shame of the Night, you play as a private investigator (PI) in Los Angeles, California. Hired by a wife worried that her husband might be cheating on her, but as the game progresses things take a turn for the worse.
instructions: Go in with a clear mind and enjoy this noir text game.

title: From Rags to Riches
description: You will make financial decisions to make a better life for yourself and family. You start off as a high school graduate and then finish as a grown person. You can either choose happiness or money.

title: Eyes
description: Eyes is a game that is supposed to take the player through a journey of mental health. The game does this by showing the even the bigger and more subtle changes in a person that can happen on an even day to day basis, and how it causes some struggle like not eating or the way you think about certain things when you interact with them.

title: Lurker
description: Lurker is an action packed story in which you a king of assassins who has lost his memories. As you play through the story you learn your family has been stolen from you, and will do whatever it takes to get them back. With the help of some a

title: The Perfect Human Project
description: The Perfect Human Project is a story about a government funded organization that experiments on creating humans to have a perfect personality. Our main character wakes up from a deep sleep with no memory of who he is or where he is. Through a series of exploration and decision making, the player will uncover secrets about the organization and its downfall.

title: The Outlier
description: The outlier is a story game based on an abstraction of a “normal” school day in elementary from my experiences. The protagonist struggles to build relationships with other classmates, but unexpectedly finds another friend where one might not expect.

title: Strangers
description: You wake up in your quaint cottage, far from the worries of civilization and time itself. Suddenly, two strangers appear at the door seeking refuge during a long journey between the nearest cities. Will you be hospitable to them, and learn more about these mysterious figures?

title: Just Trust Me
description: You’re in a car with your best friend, Devin, and there’s a body in the trunk. Devin has convinced you to come along with him up to this point, but it’s up to you whether or not you continue this journey. Should you trust Devin, or can you not go on with this any further?

Embark in a story about past regrets, where you have the power to change the past and see the future. is it worth it? is time easily changed or are we all just spectators following along through the journey life takes us.

title: All Duck or No Dinner
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to own your own collection of ducks? That was a rhetorical question, of who hasn’t thought of such wonderful thoughts. This game has the player take the role of a duck fanatic into the realms of absurdity, playing out as a complete parody of taking a walk to the park to feed ducks. 3) There wasn’t too much in terms of feedback to alter for All Duck or No Dinner so I lack anything meaningful for this response. I filled out all the placeholder text, ironed out as many of the grammar and spelling errors I could find, and beautified as much of the text with italics or colors as I could.

title: A Castaway
description: A story of a man named Jack that is casted away on a small island. Jack is against all odds. This does not stop him from trying to get of the island alive. Jacks story \is all about one night one this deserted island.

title: After School
description: Would you risk your life in order to pass a class? Play this game and see if your decisions can get you a passing grade.

title: The Big Night
description: An adventure through the most important night in the life of a young chef. Help, as he struggles to get everything to be as perfect as he imagined it.

title: A Day in the Park
description: Spend a day in the park taking in the sights before heading home. There is a bit more going on with the player character than one may think at first, can you find out why.

title: The Long Road
description: The Long Road is a first-person narrative game that explores burning out. Play as a youth that goes about their day until they hit a block in their life

title: Grandpa Ralph’s Phone
description: Grandpa Ralph’s Phone is a text based game in which the player has been hired by a mourning family to find the login information on the phone of a deceased old man. During this humorous textual investigation the player will come to know more about the old curmudgeon who once used this device.

title: Fear
description: Fear is a psychological horror game that will make you experience scenarios that will put you in difficult situations. The game lets anyone see themselves as the main characters.

title: Escape the School
description: This is a text adventure game about escape a haunted school. There are multiple dead ends ahead as a consequence of making a bad decision, player will explore the school to find a way to get back to reality while solving the mystery of the haunted school.

title: A Californian Adventure
description: This travel game simulates traveling to different locations in California. Players are given the option of gas brand, location, and dinner. They are given $500 and it is up to them how they will spend it.

title: Fate
description: In this game, you will find more than one ending depending on what path you want to take. It has some surprises and shocking turn of events that will leave you with your mouth open.

title: Locked in the Vault
description: A protagonist keeps their trauma locked away in a mental vault. They have the ability to try to unlock their memories and whatever they choose to do in them, changes the present.
instructions: The end of the game is achieved by making all the “correct” choices. If you made a “wrong” choice in the playthrough, you will be forced to play again. The ending is marked by the change of perspective from “you” to “I”.

title: The Angel
description: Family, love them or hate them, they are an integral part of your life. But when things go wrong, how would you act when you family faces the threat of danger? Would you step in? Would you feel sad? How do you fit in when you play the game of Family?
instructions: Keep clicking the blue links until you can’t any more. There are a few choices the player may select, so chose what you would do in that particular situation.

title: There is Nothing to Fear but IT
description: In the small town of Derry, your friends are being tormented by an evil entity that feeds off the fear of children. Explore the dark past and even darker tunnels of Derry. Each decision you make can depend on whether you and your friends all make it out of this alive. Stay alert as tempting bait, screaming monsters, and violent nightmares awaits you in an effort to weaken your resolve.

title: Literaria
description: Welcome to Literaria, a magical land of adventure and whimsy where books come to life and bold adventurers can partake in fantastical literary journeys beyond the pages of the text. But is everything as it seems in Literaria? The player will have to uncover the mystery that lies within

title: Abduction
description: In Abduction, you play the role of an unemployed college graduate. After finally landing a job interview, you’re puzzled to find out it was all a ploy to abduct you. You will have to find your way off the ship and make decisions that will make you question your own moral being.

title: Latte
description: Latte is a text styled game about a dog named Latte. Latte experiences abuse from his new owners and something I that I believe is realistic. This game adds the thoughts and feelings of a dog in an abusive situation

title: A Day in a Life
description: ‘A Day In a Life’ is a short narrative-based game that allows the player to make different choices while experiencing their senior year in high school. The player is transported back to high school where all those insecurities were at their strongest and most confusing.

title: Hotel Camarillo
description: This is a simulation-style game, following the journey of a patient being committed to Camarillo State Hospital in early 1957 for trying to take his own life. As a patient, you get to make the decisions you want on your treatment path, which includes walking the quad, going to church, going to therapy with the psychologist, group therapy, going to the workshop to do activities, and receiving hospital “treatments.”

title: Memory Forest
description: You wake up in a log cabin with nowhere to go but a nearby forest. You come across familiar stories in an endless loop. Will your story end or just keep repeating itself?

title: The Uriel Files
description: You are a Uriel Agent, the right hand of the government after the event of a supernatural phenomenon. Your job is to solve some of the most complex crimes out there with the power which makes you the Judge, Jury, and Executioner. With that power, will you go down in history as one who always cracks the case? Or the person who let the killer getaway?

title: A Solar Story
description: In this game, you are tasked with exploring a newly discovered solar system in a remote region of space. There are 2 planets which you can land on and explore, 1 uninhabitable planet you can visit, and a ship, called The Jezebel, which you can explore as well.

title: The House That Dog Built
description: In The House That Dog Built, the player goes on a journey from the point of view of a dog that was abandoned outside of a city. The dog goes on an adventure facing several difficulties on the way in hopes to find its previous owner. Along the way the dog learns about themself as well as what they want in life.

title: The College Student
description: It tells the story about a college student. That must make choices if they want to fail or pass the exam for chemistry

title: Forgotten
description: Not remembering who you are or what you were, you find yourself in an unfortunate situation in a mysterious place. Try to find clues on what events took place and see if you are able to escape the situation alive.

title: 161 Days
description: The player will be met with decisions which will have varying levels of impact on their experience as they are taken through what it might feel like to be diagnosed with a potentially deadly disease.

title: A Stormy Decision
description: In this game, the player navigates through the mystery surrounding an unnatural weather phenomenon. The player will have to find how why the storm acts the way it does and figure out the best way to inform the public about the threat.

title: Isekai
description: The game, “Isekai”, is a text-based RPG game wherein the player is transported to a new world wherein they have the freedom to choose which path they want to take. The game has a simple, easily understandable story that will entice gamers of all ages.

title: A Cyberpunk Rainbow
description: In A Cyberpunk Rainbow you play as Morgan Cross, an overworked office worker employed by Onyx Data Collection Inc. It just so happens that Morgan is looking for a bit of a change in their life, and as the player you will play out this day as Morgan.

title: Lost With Amnesia
description: The protagonist wakes up in an unfamiliar place. They think and realize they have no memories, no thoughts. A man keeps reappearing. How will they escape these repeated and horrible experiences? Will he continue to torment them? (I am trying to keep it so that the gender is open to whoever wishes to play the game.)

title: The Forest of Light and Dark
description: You find yourself lost in the middle of a giant forest. Ahead of you are two paths — one bright and serene, the other dark and gloomy. The light path seems to offer challenges of increasing difficulty while the dark path seems to lead into a large maze. Which path will you choose, and will you ever manage to make your way out of the forest?

title: Decisions
description: The player begins in a dream state with pleasant memories of childhood to wake up into a real-life nightmare, a vicious cycle of drug addiction, and the horrors that come with it. Through tragedy and trauma, the player stumbles across a solution and a new journey. I wanted to convey the emotions and feelings that are consistent with someone in the grips of addiction.

title: Separate Love
description: Story about a couple who slowly drifts apart from each other because of the circumstance in life.

title: An Adventure Through Time
description: Have you ever wondered what time travel would be like? Well, An Adventure Through Time will show you one of the possibilities. Get ready for a non-stop survival-based Twine Game about the dark side of time-travel, but beware what lurks in the shadows!

title: Prisoner
description: Prisoner is a game that puts you in the shoes of a prisoner who wants to escape prison. You formulate a plan to escape via a riot and your plan was a success. Now you have to decide what path you want to take to escape the prison but beware, some paths can lead you to your demise.

title: Suicide
description: Suicide is a game that follows the thoughts of a person who momentarily contemplated suicide. It gives you a quick tag along of what's going on in their head.

title: Tomb of Doom
description: You play as an archaeologist who fell into the trapped tomb of a pharaoh. You need to traverse through the trap and puzzle filled rooms while trying to escape.

title: Glue
description: A story about a family who are going through some drama. Sometimes certain family members may be the glue of the family.

title: The Ouroboros
description: The Ouroboros is to be an exploration of the self, of a person's life and how certain aspects from a loop or cycle of self destruction and how moving out from it can be uncomfortable and difficult.
instructions: One small thing to note is that there are a number of routes that loop the player back to prior portions of the game including the beginning of the game, this design is intentional as it is meant to reflect the themes the game is trying to portray.

title: Stranger Spaces
description: Welcome to Stranger Spaces, a text-based space adventure that will take you through the exciting world of the unknown. Filled with twists and unique turns, the game will throw you into a plethora of fun surprises. Players will have the opportunity to gain the knowledge to properly proceed forward by taking the time to explore the inner workings of the game.

title: Masked
description: In Masked you are placed in a complex social situation and have to navigate your way through it while attempting to manage your own satisfaction with the person you are talking to. The game is meant to simulate an autistic experiences as a way to educate the player.

title: Darkness
description: In Darkness, you are the victim of a plane crash that leaves you stranded on an island. Separated during the crash, you must work and make decisions that ultimately will help or hurt you on your journey to find other survivors.

title: Lord of Spies
description: You are born in a small countryside village in the medieval times until one day invaders disrupted that peace. You survive and live to seek vengeance on whoever disrupted that peace.

title: Hope
description: Jump into hope, to maneuver your way through a treacherous jungle after a plane crash. Animals, people, hunger and more challenges stand in your way on your quest to find a nearby civilization.

title: A Hero's Choice
description: In this game, you play as the hero who is forced to make a very difficult decision: save your family or the city. Throughout this game, you will be forced to make certain decisions that will affect the story of the game. There are multiple endings to this game, so be very cautious about your choices as a hero.

title: Channel Islands: A Day Trip Adventure
description: Channel Islands: A Day Trip Adventure is an informative adventure game that depicts a realistic experience to Santa Rosa Island in the Channel Islands chain. There are plenty of individual decisions that affect the story and gameplay. Furthermore, there’s specific customization for the player that can lead to humorous responses from the game

title: Never Ending Loop
description: The game is about a soldier being able to mentally ready for any outcome of his life from the beginning of how it started to potentially what could be traumatizing in dangerous missions. The suspense that is built from beginning to end brings context to the character and how one might be able to survive an attack but while not being in danger at the same time. The player endures the work and actual events that can change one soldier’s life one tragic event at a time.

title: Salvage
description: “A long time ago in a galaxy far far away… At the height of the Galactic Empire, Boba Fett is regarded as the greatest bounty hunter throughout the galaxy. En route to delivering an important bounty to the Crimson Dawn organization, Fett comes across a distress signal from an abandoned Imperial Star Destroyer. With the intent to salvage what he can, not all is as it seems, as Fett must fight his way through, and confront a horror beyond his imagination.”

title: In Memory of Sean
description: Captures the essence of missing a loved one, including both happy and tragic memories.

title: My New Life
description: Starts with the implementation of magic in this world with a mechanic surrounding your characters specifically. Now after the main character would meet up with his friend that allowed him to basically trade for items I wanted to try and move towards a more adventure type of narrative.

title: Best Friends
description: A murder mystery game about a group of five friends; Rosie, Jennie, Kai, Ella, and Karina. Rosie, the player, must figure out which one of her friends killed her best friend, Jennie. Prior to her death, Jennie left a letter for Rosie with a couple of clues that tie to certain events that happen in the game, as a way to help Rosie find her murderer.
instructions: Follow the clues in the way they are presented in the letter to make it easier to follow the story.

title: Beginners Luck
description: This is the the story of john, who was recently gifted a large sum of money. John’s always struggled in life and faced addiction. He takes his money to a local casino in an attempt to get more, but it doesn’t go as planned.

title: Monster House
description: You find yourself trapped in a strange, spooky house. With the front door covered in locks, you need to find all the keys and escape the house. However, you need to be careful while searching for keys, since there seems to be monsters lurking inside the house
instructions: One thing to note is that when a monster is hiding in any piece of furniture in the current room, you need to leave the room. You can’t check a different piece of furniture, otherwise you will get attacked by the monster. Also, you cannot get cornered by the monsters, as one monster appears at a time.

title: The First Date
description: This is a game based on a true story between me and my girlfriend. When we first met it was one of the best nights of my life, and I wanted to share this night with people. I want to be able to use this to show my future kids one day
instructions: Play the game a couple of times and go through and pick the different options. Most of them lead back to each other as the storyline is supposed to pull you through the evening to get to the end of the night.

title: Good Morning Sleepy Head
description: You start by waking up in the morning to something random, and the goal is to live out a normal day in the life oYou stf some random person.

title: Aftermath
description: Your choices matter, and it decides the path you take. Help a settlement in need in this postapocalyptic text adventure.

title: Swivel
description: The game is a thriller-noir game based in the mid-1980s where a string of missing people have stricken the small city of Paradigm City, with lead detectives Logan Satin and Maxwell Adams, of the Paradigm City Police Department on the case to discover what’s really going on in their city. However, after months of searching with not a trace of evidence to these disappearances, it has caused a rift in Logan and Max’s partnership, causing Logan to quit the force in disgrace and leaving Max to find out the truth for himself. But by doing this, Max has now gone missing and with a letter mysteriously being sent to Logan’s apartment, it could be a sign that Max is alive and found out what really happened, but can Logan find the courage to do one last job and save his partner before it’s too late?
instructions: Slow down and read through every detail, perhaps something that could be seen as something minor could turn out to be a major piece of the puzzle in the end….

title: Cookie Run
description: A child wanted a cookie as a midnight snack on a school night. However, their mother was still awake and nearby the kitchen, meaning the player couldn't just walk over there and get the cookie easily. So, the player had to think of different strategies to get what they want or else they would have to suffer the consequences. Will the player be able to successfully eat a cookie?"

title: Who Am I?
description: The protagonist starts making impulsive decisions that leads them to discovering that they have a mental illness. While treating their mental illness they learn that their medication counteracts with marijuana that caused them to have frightening hallucinations.

title: Dust
description: In a world where water is scarce and life draining dust is everywhere, is there still a place for mankind? The journey of the mind could reflect reality, or could signify the action man must take to alter his trajectory. Lost in a foreign land in unfamiliar territory, how would you find your way through the “Dust”?

title: The Escape
description: The game you are about to play is a strategy game with deadly consequences if you don’t pick right. You are playing as a soldier during a battle and you have to find a way to escape.

title: Break Up
description: A couple talking about breaking up. The player follows them down they're conversation and experiencing their emotions until the player must choose what their emotions will be and thus the outcome of the story.

title: Clubbing
description: This game is based on action and suspense directed to player who like action and suspense games. This game gives the player three paths or options that they can choose to go to the club with. One option is the friend Santos who always is looking for trouble, the other option is the best friend, and the third option is the girlfriend. With all of these three characters the main player is going to submerge depending on the decisions that the player make into action and suspense, where at the end the player will have the option to reflect on things and life in particular.

title: You're Smart
description: You're attending college for the first time, and everyone you know tells you how smart you are and how impossible it will be for you to fail. You shouldn't have much to worry about in school, right?

title: Super Bowl XLIX
description: Take control of the 2015 Seahawks offense during their 2 min drill to comeback and win Super Bowl XLIX.

title: A Long Night
description: Wandering through the dark night options will be provided with different choices to make. You must make your way through the darkness to find your way home, while also avoiding what may be behind you.

title: Rocky Mountains
description: Ken is an AVID hiker who loves to challenge himself although this time Ken might have bitten off more than he could chew. Come find out in Kens adventure in the Rocky Mountains.

title: A Miasma Upon Us
description: A story-driven, thriller game that is set in a fantastical world, where the player is tasked with curing diseases of a god-forsaken world. The players take control of a physician and will explore the secrets this war-torn world and uncover the tasks of what it takes to be a Transcendental.

title: Past Tense
description: In Past Tense the player is mysteriously transported to the past. Will they be able to navigate the strange building they wake up in and unlock the truth behind their strange dilemma?

title: Isekai Accusation
description: You wake up in a brand new world astonished by the new people and new scenery. However, you are in trouble with the law even though you just arrived there, use the given routes to get the clues to get you away from the danger

title: Pebbles
description: Pebbles is a Twine-based narrative game that challenges the player to make the correct survival choices while having a mystery that unfolds over time. The player discovers the motives of the main character over time. What seems like a survival game that you’ve played before is actually one that will leave you in tears.

title: Welcome to the Basement
description: Welcome to the Basement, you awake to find yourself in a basement and appear to have been kidnapped by Santa. Attempt to escape by making the right decisions or become one of Santa’s victims.

title: Divergence
description: With an unending cycle of day’s passing the protagonist then decides to lower their inhibition with edibles and alcohol. This in turn triggers a perspective shift that the protagonist is vaguely aware of, this shift influences the way the protagonist reacts to everything the coming days

title: Time Trip
description: Time is a sacred thing to many humans and is seen as an impossible thing to revisit. This game will allow you to travel through time to make a trip through your own mind. You choose your destination and whether this is a vacation of sorts through the time periods you can visit or just visit your own personal past.

title: The Lost Journal of Mars
description: A sci-fi-based thriller about the mysterious dead planet and its resistance to human colonization. Relive the fateful journey of the specialized Raider 3 crew through the lens of its seasoned commander's secretive entries. Will this crew successfully cultivate a foundation to ensure the continuation of civilization, or will history repeat itself?

title: A Dogs Tale Vol. I
description: The game begins with the player being placed in a position of unknowing and realizing you have become a dog. After, the player must make some decisions that will lead them on a couple of different paths, one that is more positive and another that is a bit darker if the player chooses more aggressive choices. Playing a story and making more admirable choices will lead you to become a human again. While making aggressive choices like biting someone will lead you to seal your fate and remain a dog.

title: Morning
description: Morning is about someone who wakes up in the morning and has some choices and actions they can do to start their day. I didn’t really think of a message or know how to effectively give one through a story, but I wanted to have the player feel free to do what they want in the game, whether they projected playing as themself or someone else. That fell short though with how limited I made it.

title: GENE WARRIOR
description: A gene awakens as Talan opens his eyes from meditating. Talan then emits flames from the senses of his body. He emits fire from the crescents of his feet and flies onto the air and into the stadium. Ready, as the crowd chant’s “FIGHT! FIGHT!”.

title: Quarter Mile
description: A race car driver and his team going through a season of racing. There are setbacks and many achievements.

title: Final Stretch
description: The player is doing a special mission requested from the general at home base to investigate a new area that showed up recently. It’s up to you to take your time on observing the daily lifestyles of the soldiers and discover secrets along the way

title: A Vacation Trip
description: Your name is Juliana (A.K.A, Jukie) and your 21st birthday is to come within the next month and you have just bought a plane ticket to Germany, with the intention of going on a solo trip. You want to be independent. You must be able to break the news to your strict parents and avoid the bad ending.

title: Escape Room
description: The game is about a man named Frank Smith who plays a series of games. Each consists of trivia questions or puzzles to solve and if you mess up during the game you might end up losing your life

title: Endless Nightmare
description: The game Endless Nightmare, puts you in the shoes of a group of boys that have their own ghost documentary channel exploring the paranormal. However, gaje has a twist and it is not your normal average haunted house game
